sentence.Network_en: I would prefer him to be with us next season.
sentence.Network_cn: 我更希望他下一个赛季和我们在一起。

sentence.Network_en: This brings us to the second question I asked.
sentence.Network_cn: 这就将我们带到了我所提的第二个问题。

sentence.Network_en: What is right for us need not be right for others.
sentence.Network_cn: 对我们来说是对的东西，对别人来说未必正确。

he gave us eyes to see them祂赐福与双眼让我们看见

4 and disobeyed your commandments . so you handed us over to plundering , exile , and death , till we were a byword a reproach in all the nations among whom you scattered us .因为他们没有遵守你的诫命所以你使我们遭遇劫掠、俘掳、死亡，使我们流亡到一切外邦人中，受他们的讽刺、嘲笑、诅咒。

...，倒是十分恰当。因为它宣称珍道具并非完全“无用”(useless)，可是实际又没办法使，也就算不上“有用”(useful)，于是只好被称作“并非无用”了。

jx.jx_en_mean: a person recognized as an accepted member of a particular group, typically one that is exclusive in some way

phrase.cizu_name: us and them (or them and us)

jx.jx_en_mean: expressing a sense of division within a group of people
jx.jx_cn_mean: 我们和他们，自己人和非自己人

lj.lj_ly: negotiations were hampered by an ‘us and them’ attitude between management and unions.
lj.lj_ls: 劳资谈判因对立态度受阻。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English ūs, accusative and dative of we, of Germanic origin: related to Dutch ons and German uns

entry.def: A speaker or writer uses us to refer both to himself or herself and to one or more other people. You can use us before a noun to make it clear which group of people you are referring to.

example.ex: Neither of us forgot about it...
Heather went to the kitchen to get drinks for us...
example.tran: 希瑟去厨房给我们拿饮料。

entry.def: Us is sometimes used to refer to people in general.

example.ex: All of us will struggle fairly hard to survive if we are in danger...
example.tran: 所有人在身处险境时都会努力地要保住性命。

example.ex: Each of us will have our own criteria for success.
example.tran: 每个人对于成功都有自己的标准。

entry.def: A speaker or writer may use us instead of 'me' in order to include the audience or reader in what they are saying.

example.ex: This brings us to the second question I asked.
example.tran: 这就将我们带到了我所提的第二个问题。

entry.def: In non-standard English, us is sometimes used instead of 'me'.

example.ex: 'Hang on a bit,' said Eileen. 'I'm not finished yet. Give us a chance.'
example.tran: “等一下，”艾琳说，“我还没做完呢。给我个机会吧。”

means.word_mean: 1. North American republic containing 50 states - 48 conterminous states in North America plus Alaska in northwest North America and the Hawaiian Islands in the Pacific Ocean; achieved independence in 1776

sentences.cn: 任何敌人的恐吓都不能使我们屈服。
